casebody.data:
MESECK TOWING & TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, Inc., as Owner of the Steamtug John A. Meseck, Libelant-Appellee, v. Steamtug THE NEW YORK CENTRAL NO. 24 and The New York Central Railroad Company, Respondent-Appellant. No. 123. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit Dec. 5, 1938. Clive C. Iiandy, of New York City (Kenneth O. Mott-Smith, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Kirlin, Campbell, Hickox, Keating & McGrann, of New York City (Eugene F. Gilligan and W. H. McGrann, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
